posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content: I like this one. Pretty solid AB and AC. Good saves. Great damage output with Str 32, DM and SA. Nice skillset and added flexibilty with UMD.

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Me too, good Job Bru.

I see a problem with the weapon choice, though. Your AC coming from Haste and Divine Shield is all Dodge, so lost when flat-footed. If you get caught by surprise, you'll be in trouble. Also, the advantage of having a 2-hander is multiplying a high STR modifier by 1.5 when dealing damage, but this build splits CHA and STR enhancement, so I would stick with a 1-hander and a Shield for an even higher AC. That way you will at least have some AC left when you are caught flat-footed. Other than that I'd swap Epic Fiendish Servant for Epic Prowess, because it helps you generate sneak attacks, so the sooner the better.

Take it EZ!
